sentences.en: a puritanical father who wouldn’t let his children watch television
sentences.cn: 不让孩子看电视的清教徒式的父亲

sentences.en: He has a puritanical attitude towards sex.
sentences.cn: 他在性问题上主张克制，反对纵欲。

sentences.en: In contrast, men such as Rockefeller and Ford exhibited puritanical qualities.
sentences.cn: 与之相反, 洛克菲勒和福特表现出的是清教徒的品性.

sentences.en: Now you are coming over all puritanical about nothing.
sentences.cn: 你太古板了，其实没什么事。

sentences.en: She was anything but puritanical in her behavior.
sentences.cn: 她的举止一点也不拘谨.

sentences.en: The atmosphere at the school was oppressively puritanical.
sentences.cn: 那所学校是清教徒式的风气，显得很压抑。

sentences.en: The latest research suggests a more prosaic, democratic, even puritanical view of the world.
sentences.cn: 最新的研究令我们对世界的看法呈现出更加平淡 、 更加大众, 更加严谨的色彩.

sentences.en: Their parents had a puritanical streak and didn't approve of dancing.
sentences.cn: 他们的父母管教颇严格，不赞成跳舞。
我有着清教徒般严谨的一面。

trans.tran_cn: <贬>清教徒式的，道德极严格的
trans.tran_en: very strict about moral matters, especially sex – used in order to show disapproval
